feature.label: ArchiMate for Papyrus
feature.description: An ArchiMate® 2.1 plugin for Papyrus based upon UML. This plugin contains one diagram per extension/layer in ArchiMate 2.1®, all with a complete palette/toolbox. ----- The elements are shown in ArchiMate® "rectangular" form as default, but may be changed into "symbol" form via the property/appearance tab for each element. ----- Environment requirements: * Neon (original version) * Papyrus 2.0.0
